description: An ancient river of the Peloponnese, rising near the site of ancient Kleitor and flowing south to join the Ladon river.

history.comment: cleaned up references; added RE reference; added MANTO reference provided by MANTO team; added Geonames reference; added Maher 2015; summary; removed Smith (insufficiently helpful, given other literature); added associated modern names; added associated modern locations, which collectively supersede the currently published location
replacing the abbreviation fl. with (river) to bring titles into conformance with Editorial Guidelines
Global migration and reindexing of citations and provenance, February 2012
Detail text updated from former modernLocation. See http://atlantides.org/trac/pleiades/wiki/PlaceDetailsUpgrade
